div.span: Miles of Smiles Meal Program Cooking Instructions
Allen County Schools Household Contact Information Update

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'PDF', 'Download', 'Allen County Schools Household Contact Information Update');

div.a: Allen County Schools Household Contact Information Update

span.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; background-color: #ffffff; text-align: center

span.span: If you aren't receiving school/district text messages and would like to receive them, you may need to opt in.

div.span: Text YES to 87569 to opt back in to receive text messages
and follow directions to get started.
Turn a cellular phone into a mobile hot spot to allow wireless devices to connect to the internet through a cellular phone, if you do not have wireless internet at home.

span.div: Keep in mind this uses data. If you are not on an unlimited data plan you might want to monitor your usage.

div.span: Check voicemail from outside of the district

ol.li: Enter your voicemail extension and # sign.

div.span: Conference calling from your classroom phone

ol.li: Dial 9 and then the number you are calling (enter a long distance code if necessary)
After the first caller comes online press the "Conf" button on the phone. ("conf" will show on the display screen, the button is right below it)
Dial 9 and then the second number you are calling (enter a long distance code if necessary)
After the second caller comes online press the "Join" button on the phone ("Join" will show on the display screen, the button is right below it)

span.p: If you need to conference in more than two callers you perform steps 1 and 2 until you have all callers dialed in and then press the "Join" button.

tr.td:
570 Oliver Street, Scottsville, KY
Phone: (270) 618-3181
Fax: (270) 618-3185
